hadiths.text: Basheer b. Yasar said that a man from the Ansar called Sahi b. abu-Hatmah told him that Messenger of Allah (May peace be upon him) gave one Hundred camels to him a blood-wit from among the camels of sadaqah, i.e a blood-wit for the Ansari who was killed at Khaibar

chapter.ara-name: باب كَمْ يُعْطَى الرَّجُلُ الْوَاحِدُ مِنَ الزَّكَاةِ
chapter.eng-name: How Much Zakat Can Be Given To A Single Person
